pages.text: There are two differently obtained kinds of batteries at this stage. One can be used to create a portable battery backpack, the other one for a better stationary energy storage.
The lithium cell has already been introduced in tools. Craft 6 of them for the batpack.
Let 32 redstone chemically react with a diamond to get a synthetic redstone crystal. Two of them plus a silicon plate can be assembled to an energy crystal.
The energy crystal can now be used to craft an MFE.
